title: Software Tester
points: Actively participated in Scrum Agile ceremonies, including Daily Stand-ups, Sprint Planning, Sprint Review, and Retrospectives to ensure continuous delivery and improvement.
Conducted manual testing, including writing detailed test cases, executing functional and regression tests, and validating results against requirements.
Designed and built automated test cases using Katalon Studio to improve testing efficiency and coverage across web applications.
Performed API testing using Postman, validating request/response integrity, status codes, and business logic through various endpoints.

title: Software Quality Assurance
points: Collaboration with Developers - Participated in regular Product Review meetings to ensure alignment between development and QA. - Reported bugs and issues in a clear and structured manner, promoting fast resolution and continuous product improvement.

Quality Assurance Responsibilities - Initiated and documented detailed Test Cases to cover various functional and edge-case scenarios. - Coordinated flow testing sessions with developers to ensure early detection of integration issues.
API Testing - Utilized Postman and Insomnia to perform API testing, including executing API calls and validating responses against expected results and schema.

Manual Testing - Developed structured test cases based on requirements and user stories. - Executed manual test scenarios across multiple platforms and browsers. - Reported detailed feedback and identified issues to the development team. - Conducted re-testing after fixes were implemented to ensure resolution and prevent regression.

Web Test Automation (Selenium Java with Gherkin) - Assisted Lead QA in researching and establishing automation testing strategies. - Supported internal QA training by helping educate team members on Java Selenium automation fundamentals. - Developed and maintained automation test scripts using Selenium Java and Gherkin for behavior-driven testing. - Regularly executed automated test cases and generated test reports using Allure. - Maintained automation test suites and provided updates and reports to the Tech Team.

title: Software Implementation
points: Conducted training sessions for hospital staff and clients on how to use the Web-based Electronic Medical Record (ERM) application, ensuring smooth adoption and understanding of key system features.
Collected and documented user complaints, feedback, and enhancement requests, then communicated them clearly to the development team for further improvement.
Performed manual testing on newly developed or fixed features to ensure they met functional and usability requirements before deployment.
Designed and executed User Acceptance Testing (UAT) based on real-world usage scenarios to validate the system from an end-user perspective.

title: Intern System Analyst, Quality Assurance, and Technical Writer
points: Assisted System Analyst in designing ERD (Entity Relationship Diagram), DFD (Data Flow Diagram), Flowcharts, and BPMN to support system planning and development.
Created comprehensive documentation including User Requirement Documents, Functional Specifications, and other technical materials to align development with client expectations.
Translated business needs into detailed development tasks for programmers, ensuring clarity and alignment with user requirements.
Performed thorough manual testing on frontend components to validate functionality, usability, and responsiveness before deployment.
Actively collaborated with cross-functional stakeholders, including clients, developers, and project managers, to ensure smooth communication and alignment throughout the project lifecycle.
Participated in Sprint Reviews to present progress to clients and gather feedback for iterative improvement in Agile development environments.
Developed and executed User Acceptance Testing (UAT) scenarios to ensure final product met business requirements and client satisfaction before go-live.
